ud5.9:1.2: At one time the Buddha was wandering in the land of the Kosalans together with a large Saṅgha of mendicants.
ud5.9:1.3: Now at that time several students were passing by not far from the Buddha in a teasing manner.
ud5.9:2.1: Then, knowing the meaning of this, on that occasion the Buddha expressed this heartfelt sentiment:
ud5.9:3.2: they talk, their words right out of bounds.
ud5.9:3.3: They blab at will, their mouths agape,
ud5.9:3.4: and no-one knows what leads them on.”
